alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 927 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms over Southwest Montana and Northeast Idaho that were causing gusty and erratic winds. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Ennis, Big Sky, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village, Jeffers, Targhee Pass, Cameron and Raynolds Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Occasional cloud to ground lightning was occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley
